title: What other mage can safe a teammate like that
body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o2YigK6MPTs&feature=youtu.be

Only our favorite stone weaver.
There is no other mage (excluding supports like bard)

replies.body: {{champion:48}} {{champion:83}} {{champion:59}}

Nice mages you listed there

{{champion:34}} {{champion:268}} {{champion:45}}  if you want a wall
{{champion:99}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:61}} {{champion:134}} {{champion:115}} {{champion:26}} if you are fine with any form of saving

{{champion:134}}  

Shows up, presses Win button, kills Lee Sin.
Shows up, presses Win button, has no spheres stacked and lee sin laughs.
She would have been too far away to be there in time :)

In time?
Jhin was already outside of Lee and Ziggs' range and there was nobody from their team in the top side of the map to cut him off.
{{champion:61}}
but i main tali atm too

{{champion:101}} - press ult and force them to choose between chasing (and walking in a predicable path) or living.

Better for saving if you have Rylais to apply the CC from across the map.
I really want Taliyah to be my go-to mid because I love earth bending but I suck at her.

Don't give up. 
She takes some more practice than most other mages, but she is a lot of fun to play.
{{champion:34}}
Man anytime i do that jhin gets scared by the wall and turns around ;~;

Considering that Lee Sin fucked up his pathing before you even appeared?

Any mage by simply existing.
Why?
Because Jhin saved himself.
Veigar can literally press E somewhat near the enemy, and save his entire team

Uh but if he started off at the same place where I was with Taliyah, we would never be fast enough to arrive where jhin was to use his E and save him ;)

It's just based on the situation in the video, but generally I understand what you mean.
Ugh boring :/ You got me there.

i once had a save like that as tali, i ulted just as blitz shot his hook at my teemo, intercepted it by knocking my teemo back and away from the enemy team
must've moved the teemo out of the way as the hook bypasses terrain
pretty sure my deplacent effect overwrote blitzs

The best feeling
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
{{champion:7}} Ult clone to block a q, and if anything u could W +rW to get to jhin and E the lee
Bullshit, that is clearly ice she is bending.

{{champion:161}} *raises tentacle*

We could always just ~~kill ~~research them.
https://media.giphy.com/media/ZIzN7YWNuTUYg/giphy.gif
my favourite leaver back at it again

I mean, like THAT exactly, no one. Though anivia, thresh, tahm, can all do pretty similar.

And given that thresh can afford to go mobility boots, every fucking game, chances are that he could've made it there just as fast.
Charm.
{{champion:268}} {{champion:9}} {{champion:34}}

{{champion:34}} W, {{champion:268}} R, and technically {{champion:45}} E

{{summoner:12}}

Any artillery mage with range and speed (maybe a few wind dragons) would be able to pose a threat to both of the enemy champions.
Lee would get greedy and continue to chase, die in the process.
The special thing was the wall tho, ziggs wouldn't have hesitated if there as no wall deviding us I think, generally tho, you're right.
{{champion:4}} ;P
I think Twisted Fate could've done it as well, ult and pick gold card then port in and stun the lee sin.
save*
